mdRecord.dcterms:description: Part of joke visible in photo 5 of this series: a variation of the chicken crossing the road, but with a woman rather than a chicken. Response crossed out; responses to joke. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.
Why did the woman cross the road? There wasn't a kitchen on the other side. | NO | HA!
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Stereotypes (Social psychology)
Women
Humor
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
